NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
72 
F
igure 8-7 CTG Action Plan for abnormalities in variability, decelerations and contractions 
NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
73 
D
ocumentation 
• After CTG interpretation, write a note about the findings in the woman’s notes, so that a record of the CTG is still
av
ailable even if the CTG tracing is lost.
o Describe each element. Do not just write “reactive” for norm
